Detailed Description

Notesfile statistics datatype and related functions.

Function Documentation

int get_stats ( const struct nfref *  ref,
struct stats *  stats 
) [inline]

Retrieve usage statistics for the notesfile specified in ref. Guaranteed to modify every value in stats; therefore, there is no need to call zero_stats before this function.

Parameters:
ref A reference to a notesfile.
stats The structure to populate with statistics for ref.
Returns:
FIXME
Side effects:
The statistics stored in stats will be modified.

void stats_accumulate ( const struct stats *  stats,
struct stats *  total 
)

Add the statistics from one notesfiles to a running total.

Parameters:
stats The statistics to add to the running total.
total The running total of statistics.
Side effects:
The statistics stored in total will be modified.

struct stats* stats_alloc ( void   )  [read]

Create a new struct stats.

Returns:
A newly allocated struct stats. This should be freed with free_stats when no longer needed.
See also:
free_stats

void stats_free ( struct stats *  stats  ) 

Deallocate stats.

Parameters:
stats The structure to deallocate.
Side effects:
stats will be invalidated, and should no longer be used.
See also:
alloc_stats
